data: This is the story of how a middle-aged spinster lost her mind, deserted her domestic gods in the city, took a furnished house for the summer out of town, and found herself involved in one of those mysterious crimes that keep our newspapers and detective agencies happy and prosperous.
detective fiction|browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels|category: american literature
